column1: Bottom line is that one must handle the mask hygienically, particularly when removing. It should be removed by the loops with clean hands and immediately trashed. Also, no touching or adjusting while wearing or you’re basically a #COVID19 germ re-distribution factory

It’s possible that the use of sputum suction in place of ventilators could significantly reduce deaths of critical Coronavirus patients #coronavirus #CoronaVirusUpdate #COVID2019 #COVID19 @DrTedros #COVIDー19 #Covid19usa
